Hey Eric,

There are a couple of steps that I have not fully documented - you'll need to set up an app on Slack which the serverless functions should post updates to. without that the comments will only get as far as the queue.

Otherwise things should work fine. As long as you create the correct build hooks and triggers to run your build and perform the notifications.
